name: Run World
description:
It's just a little Platformer. You can play alone or together to find out how to get to the end of the short level.

Controls

Move: A, D / Analogue stick
Jump: Space / Button 3
Backflip: W / Button 4
Smash Jump: O / Button 2
Climb: P / Button 1
Duck: S / Button 6
Shoot: I / Button 5
Change Controller: Enter / Button 10
Exit: ESC

Other

Run World uses JInput
